sourcesContent:
/** * Mini E-Commerce Store - Main Application Component * * CLIENT-SIDE ROUTING EXPLANATION: * ==================================== * This app uses React Router for client-side routing, which means: * * 1. SAME URL STRUCTURE: The app works with identical URLs in both local * development and production environments: * - Local: http://localhost:3000/cart * - Production: https://yourdomain.com/cart * * 2. NO PAGE RELOADS: React Router handles navigation client-side, * providing a smooth, fast user experience without full page refreshes. * * 3. SPA (SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION): The entire app loads once, and * React dynamically updates the content based on the URL. * * 4. ROUTE PERMISSIONS: All routes are accessible to all users: * - Public routes: "/", "/cart", "/checkout-success" * - No authentication required for any route * * 5. LOCAL VS PRODUCTION: * - Local: Run with `npm start` → localhost:3000 * - Production: Run `npm run build` → deploy to any static host * - Both use the SAME URL paths and routing logic * * DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS: * ========================= * For the app to work correctly in production with client-side routing, * your server must be configured to: * * - Serve index.html for ALL routes (not just the root) * - This allows React Router to handle the routing client-side * * Example server configurations: * - Netlify: Create public/_redirects with "/* /index.html 200" * - Vercel: Automatic configuration (no setup needed) * - Apache: Use .htaccess with fallback to index.html * - Nginx: Configure try_files to serve index.html */ import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { StoreProvider } from './context/StoreContext'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; import Home from './pages/Home'; import Cart from './components/Cart'; import Checkout from './components/Checkout'; import Admin from './pages/Admin'; function App() { return (
{/* Route Definitions - Same URLs work locally and in production */} } /> } /> } /> } />

© 2026 MiniStore. All rights reserved.

 ); } export default App;
